resources.string:
This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your personal information in accordance with data protection laws. By using this application, you agree to the practices described below.
 
 1. Information Collection:

We may collect personal information such as transaction records, budget data, and dates for functionality purposes. This data is stored locally and not shared with third parties.
 
 2. Use of Information:

Information is used solely to provide features such as budgeting, summaries, and reminders. We do not sell or share user data with external services.
 
 3. Data Security:

All data is stored securely within your device.
 We implement internal backups and encourage you to use provided export and restore features responsibly.
 
 4. Third-party Services:

This app does not use or integrate with third-party APIs that collect personal information.
 
 5. Changes to This Policy:

We reserve the right to update this Privacy Policy as necessary.
 Changes will be notified through the app update log or on the app interface.
 
 6. Contact:

If you have any concerns or inquiries, you may contact the developer at kumodnenuk@gmail.com.
 
 Effective Date: April 22, 2025.

This app respects your privacy. All financial data is stored locally and never shared.
